item.title: 【godot】一、开发环境部署及示例
item.description:
引擎编译

官方源码仓库：godot

官方godot-cpp仓库：godot-cpp

编译指令

在Godot_Engine根目录下，执行下方编译指令scons,有以下可选参数

  1. 指定目标平台 ：：platform=windows/android/macos
  2. 是否带符号表 ：：debug_symbols=yes/no
  3. 构建目标类型 ：：target=editor/template_debug/template_release
  4. 是否输出编译指令：：verbose=yes
  5. 目标平台芯片架构：：arch=x86_64/arm64v8
  6. 是否生成编译json：：compiledb=true
  7. 指定编译线程数量：：-j8/-j16
  8. 使用 LLVM/Clang 编译器而非 GCC ：：use_llvm=yes/no

1.windows平台编译
	生成路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\bin
	编译路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine
	编译指令：scons compiledb=true debug_symbols=yes verbose=yes -j16

2.android的libgodot_android.so编译
	生成路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\platform\android\java\lib\libs\debug\arm64-v8a
	编译路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine
	编译指令：scons platform=android target=template_debug debug_symbols=yes compiledb=true
    或scons platform=android store_release=true production=true dev_mode=false dev_build=false debug_symbols=true tests=false target=template_release arch=arm64 compiledb=true
	
3.生成Android导出模板
    前置生成：
        生成debug的so：scons platform=android target=template_debug arch=arm64 dev_build=yes generate_android_binaries=yes
        生成release的so：scons platform=android target=template_release arch=arm64 dev_build=yes generate_android_binaries=yes
    生成路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\bin\android_release.apk
    编译路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\platform\android\java
    编译指令：./gradlew.bat generateGodotTemplates

4.android的aar的编译，godot-lib.template_debug.aar
	生成路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\platform\android\java\lib\build\outputs\aar
	编译路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\platform\android\java
	编译指令：gradlew.bat   :lib:bundleTemplateDebugAar
	
5.生成sln文件
	scons vsproj=yes
	
6.生成GDExtension的胶水代码
	1. 编译extension_api.json文件： bin\godot.windows.editor.x86_64.exe --dump-extension-api 
	2. 在godot-cpp中执行代码生成： scons debug_symbols=yes verbose=yes generate_bindings=yes custom_api_file=E:\Godot\godot-cpp\gdextension\extension_api.json

7.导出资源包zip/pck
    生成路径：${YourProjectPath}
    编译路径：${YourProjectPath}
    1. E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\bin\godot.windows.editor.x86_64.exe --headless --export-pack "Android" game.zip
    2. E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\bin\godot.windows.editor.x86_64.exe --headless --export-pack "Android" game.pck

//运行编辑器
"godot.exe --path ${PgmPath} -v -e"

//直接运行runtime
"godot.exe --path ${PgmPath} -v"

JNI路径

文件路径：E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\platform\android\java_godot_lib_jni.h

模块(Module)开发

参考文档：自定义 C++ 模块 — Godot Engine (4.x) 简体中文文档

文件及结构

新建一个模块需要以下文件及结构，存放在E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\modules目录底下 。

在E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\modules\register_module_types.gen.cpp文件中，会根据我们模块中的SCsub文件，自动生成实际的模块注册代码，如下：

 1

//register_module_types.gen.cpp 中自动生成的代码，用于模块的实际注册。
#include "modules/ns_test_module/register_types.h"

//...

#ifdef MODULE_NS_TEST_MODULE_ENABLED
	initialize_ns_test_module_module(p_level);
#endif

//...

#ifdef MODULE_NS_TEST_MODULE_ENABLED
	uninitialize_ns_test_module_module(p_level);
#endif

SCsub和config.py

SCsub是这个模块的编译指令，包括源码的收集、头文件路径添加、静态库的链接等。

与config.py结合使用，可以动态的管理该模块的编译选项，以及将该模块自动的生成到E:\Godot\Godot_Engine\modules\register_module_types.gen.cpp进行模块的注册。

from misc.utility.scons_hints import *

Import("env")
Import("env_modules")

env_nstest = env_modules.Clone()

# 添加第三方库的头文件路径
env.Append(CPPPATH=["#modules/matrix_data_pipeline/include"])
env.Append(CPPPATH=["#modules/matrix_data_pipeline/include/NSCppData"])
env.Append(CPPPATH=["#modules/matrix_data_pipeline/include/NSCppData/ProtoGen"])

# 添加库文件路径
if env["platform"] == "windows":
    env.Append(LIBPATH=["#modules/matrix_data_pipeline/lib/windows"])
    env.Append(LIBS=["NSCppData","libprotobuf"])
elif env["platform"] == "android":
    env.Append(LIBPATH=["#modules/matrix_data_pipeline/lib/android"])
    env.Append(LIBS=["mylib"])


# Godot source files
module_obj = []

env_nstest.add_source_files(module_obj, "*.cpp")
# env_nstest.add_source_files(module_obj, "editor/*.cpp")

env.modules_sources += module_obj

register_types

该文件负责对自身模块中声明的godot类型进行类型注册，同时也可以在相对较早的阶段（main函数的setup阶段）进行一些单例类的实例化。 如果在进行编辑器工具类的开发，则工具类的实例化和注册，也是在该阶段进行的。

//==============register_types.cpp============
#include "register_types.h"
#include "core/object/object.h"

#include "ns_test_module.h"

void initialize_ns_test_module_module(ModuleInitializationLevel p_level) {
	if (p_level != MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE) {
		return;
	}
	GDREGISTER_CLASS(NsTestModule) //注册类型
	GDREGISTER_CLASS(NsTestResource)

}

void uninitialize_ns_test_module_module(ModuleInitializationLevel p_level) {
	if (p_level != MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE) {
		return;
	}
}

#include "register_types.h"

#include <godot_cpp/godot.hpp>

#include "godot_cpp/classes/editor_interface.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/classes/editor_plugin.hpp"
#include "godot_cpp/variant/utility_functions.hpp"

#include "Test/Fow.h"

// Spline
#include "Spline/Spline.h"
#include "Spline/SplineGizmo.h"
#include "Spline/SplineGizmoPlugin.h"

//Profiler
#include "ProfilerLib/ProfilerUI.h"
#include "ProfilerLib/ProfilerTest.h"

using namespace godot;

class MyEditorPlugin : public EditorPlugin {
    GDCLASS(MyEditorPlugin, EditorPlugin);

    Ref<SplineGizmoPlugin> gizmo_plugin;
protected:
    static void _bind_methods() {

    }
public:
    virtual void _enter_tree() override {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: MyEditorPlugin :: _enter_tree");
        
        gizmo_plugin.instantiate();
        gizmo_plugin->create_handle_material("HandleMat");
        
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("RedMat", Color(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("GreenMat", Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("BlueMat", Color(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("Color1", Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("Color2", Color(1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("Color3", Color(1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f));
        gizmo_plugin->create_material("Color4", Color(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
        add_node_3d_gizmo_plugin(gizmo_plugin);
    }

    virtual void _exit_tree() override {
        UtilityFunctions::print("UnInit :: MyEditorPlugin :: _exit_tree");

        remove_node_3d_gizmo_plugin(gizmo_plugin);
    }
};

void initialize_GodotTest_module(ModuleInitializationLevel p_level) {
    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: Scene");
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(FowTexture);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(Spline);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(ProfilerContext);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(ProfilerUI);




        GDREGISTER_CLASS(ProfilerTest);
    }

    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_EDITOR) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: Editor");
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(SplineGizmo);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(SplineGizmoPlugin);
        GDREGISTER_CLASS(MyEditorPlugin);


        EditorPlugins::add_by_type<MyEditorPlugin>();

    }
    UtilityFunctions::print("Init :: None :: ", p_level);
}

void uninitialize_GodotTest_module(ModuleInitializationLevel p_level) {
    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("UnInit :: Scene");

        // return;
    }
    if (p_level == MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_EDITOR) {
        UtilityFunctions::print("UnInit :: Editor");
        EditorPlugins::remove_by_type<MyEditorPlugin>();
        // return;
    }
}

extern "C" {
// Initialization.
GDExtensionBool GDE_EXPORT
GodotTest_library_init(GDExtensionInterfaceGetProcAddress p_get_proc_address,
                       GDExtensionClassLibraryPtr p_library,
                       GDExtensionInitialization *r_initialization) {
  godot::GDExtensionBinding::InitObject init_obj(p_get_proc_address, p_library,
                                                 r_initialization);

  init_obj.register_initializer(initialize_GodotTest_module);
  init_obj.register_terminator(uninitialize_GodotTest_module);
  init_obj.set_minimum_library_initialization_level(
      MODULE_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE);

  return init_obj.init();
}
}

#!/usr/bin/env python
import os
import sys

def log_env(env,key):
    print(f"{key}:{env[key]}")

env = SConscript("godot-cpp/SConstruct")

project_name = "Godot_DemoSR"

# For reference:
# - CCFLAGS are compilation flags shared between C and C++
# - CFLAGS are for C-specific compilation flags
# - CXXFLAGS are for C++-specific compilation flags
# - CPPFLAGS are for pre-processor flags
# - CPPDEFINES are for pre-processor defines
# - LINKFLAGS are for linking flags

# tweak this if you want to use different folders, or more folders, to store your source code in.
env.VariantDir('build', 'src', duplicate=0)
env.Append(CPPPATH=["build/"])
sources = Glob("build/*.cpp") + Glob("build/**/*.cpp") + Glob("build/**/**/*.cpp")
if env["platform"] == "macos":
    library = env.SharedLibrary(
        "{}/bin/libgdDemoSR.{}.{}.framework/libgdDemoSR.{}.{}".format(
            project_name, env["platform"], env["target"], env["platform"], env["target"]
        ),
        source=sources,
    )
elif env["platform"] == "windows":
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("/std:c++17")
    env.Append(CXXFLAGS = ["/std:c++20","/W4", "/WX", "/wd4100","/wd4244","/wd4305","/wd4201","/wd4127","/wd4267","/wd5054","/wd4996","/Zi","/FS"])
    env.Append(LIBS = ["libzmq"])
    env.Append(CPPDEFINES=["ZMQ_STATIC"])
    env.Append(LIBPATH = ["./lib/windows"])
    library = env.SharedLibrary(
    "{}/bin/libgdDemoSR{}{}".format(project_name, env["suffix"], env["SHLIBSUFFIX"]),
    source=sources,
    )
elif env["platform"] == "android":
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("-std=c++17")
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("-fno-exceptions")
 #   env["CXX"] = env["CXX"].replace("23.2.8568313","27.0.12077973")
    env.Append(CXXFLAGS = ["-std=c++20","-fexceptions",'-Wall', '-Wextra', '-Werror',"-Wno-unused-parameter"])
    env.Append(LIBS = ["libzmq","GLESv3"])
    env.Append(CPPDEFINES=["ZMQ_STATIC","NS_ANDROID"])
    env.Append(LIBPATH = ["./lib/android"])
    library = env.SharedLibrary(
    "{}/bin/libgdDemoSR{}{}".format(project_name, env["suffix"], env["SHLIBSUFFIX"]),
    source=sources,
    )
else:
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("-std=c++17")
    env["CXXFLAGS"].remove("-fno-exceptions")
    env.Append(CXXFLAGS = ["-std=c++20","-fexceptions",'-Wall', '-Wextra', "-Wno-unused-parameter","-Wno-changes-meaning"])
    env.Append(LIBS = ["libzmq","GLESv3"])
    env.Append(CPPDEFINES=["ZMQ_STATIC"])
    env.Append(LIBPATH = ["./lib"])
    library = env.SharedLibrary(
    "{}/bin/libgdDemoSR{}{}".format(project_name, env["suffix"], env["SHLIBSUFFIX"]),
    source=sources,
    )

Default(library)
